name: Project Reignition
summary: Project Reignition is an on-rails platformer developed by KumaPauZ, also known as Kuma. This unofficial remake of Sonic and the Secret Rings, originally developed by Sonic Team and published by SEGA in 2007 for the Wii, aims to reimagine the classic game for modern systems. Built using the Godot engine, this open-source and free project features enhanced graphics, refined controls, and a smoother frame rate, offering a fresh experience while staying true to the original.
